website_summaries.verdict: A pot rack that can do double duty as a spice shelf.
pros: The top shelf on this rack is designed with a decorative edge to make it useful for holding smaller items like spices or condiments
Pretty decorative scroll adds beauty to your space
Compact size makes it versatile for your space
Great customer support from the maker
cons: The metal quality is a bit thin on this model
It works best if your pots are not very heavy

customer_reviews.title: A Real Problem Solver
customer_reviews.text: This rack is smaller than most but is perfect for that small space. It holds a lot of utensils and organizes things that would otherwise end up as clutter. I use it for spatulas, large mixing spoons, hand-held strainers, etc., anything that has a hole in the handle. This gets rid of the drawers full of undefined messes. It allows me to quickly find the utensil I need. Oddly enough, loaded up it looks really attractive. I had two pots that were constantly in the way. The small shelf on top was just the perfect depth for these tall, slim pasta pots. This rack is a real problem solver. I can highly recommend this rack.
customer_reviews.author: Evening Iris

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, holds all my hanging pans and their lids easily. The hooks even fit the the handles of Calphalon Contemporary pans—one of the main complaints people had about those pans was the shape of the hook opening
customer_reviews.author: Jacob & Rachel Jay

customer_reviews.title: This item appears to be sturdy. There was just one problem
customer_reviews.text: This item appears to be sturdy. There was just one problem. The holes for the mounting bracket did not align. One end piece was attached In reverse position which prevents it from being mounted on the wall. I think it was just a random error. All other aspects of the rack appear to be quality and well made. After a conversation with the company this item was replaced. Their immediate attention to the issue and positive attitude was very refreshing. They stood behind their product, and replaced the defective item. There was no additional charges to me for shipping and handling either. I am impressed with the prompt response and service. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Overton

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This item is priced to high for the quality of the product. Looks like it was made in a junior high school welding shop. One of the weld broke on the support arm before it was installed. Junk. You should spend your money elsewhere Zesproka contacted me immediately after the review written above and sent another rack to my address to replace the damaged rack. The second rack was better quality and I have no issues with the newer rack. The installation was easy. I used heavy duty wall anchors from Lowes for the install inside an RV camper. Thanks to Zesproka for the replacement and quick response.
customer_reviews.author: John Trahan

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't assemble due to assembly error
customer_reviews.text: It was missing a hole in one if the supporting rods, which made it so you couldn't align the shelf onto the brackets. It looked nice, but sucked not being able to actually assemble it. I was just going to send it back and have a replacement sent for it, but the only option was to return it and get your money back. Since we could exchange it, we decided it wasn't worth it to try again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed not having to look on the bottom of a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a large kitchen rack, but for my needs, 6-8 pots and pans, it is a space saver. Except for the large lids, I can fit all the others on top. Wrought iron black. I have enjoyed not having to look on the bottom of a cabinet to find what I need.
customer_reviews.author: The Artful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works well for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and good for the price. However, the spacing is somewhat weird for the holes so they didn't line up with the studs on my wall. It comes with wall anchors, but they just do not seem sturdy enough. I ended up taking a piece of oak, cutting it to the correct side, routing the edgers, then staining and varnishing it. I then attached the piece of oak to the wall into the studs, then attached the rack to the oak. Looks very nice and can hold a lot of cast iron pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Big Tron

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but takes installation needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The included hardware did not seem sufficient enough (and the screws strip out very easily) so I had to go to the hardware store to get someone better and the instructions on how to mount it were very vague. There was no info on which size drill bit to use with the anchors and no information on how far apart the holes are from each other so I had to measure myself. It seems like it's pretty easy to print a template to tape to the wall like most items include today
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: If you are handy, this is a good bargain
customer_reviews.text: The Rack is nice, and serves its purpose. However, the drywall anchors provided to mount them are defective. All four of the anchors stripped before the screws were tight enough to support the rack. I had to buy new anchors locally. Additionally, the part of the rack that the supports are bolted to, was not straight, and made the brackets crooked. They were easy enough to straighten, but a little quality control may be in order. Once mounted, they look nice and support lots of pans. If you are handy, this is a good bargain, if not, I would avoid them.
customer_reviews.author: wRONgGuy

customer_reviews.title: Provided mounting hardware is of extremely poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The permanently attached bolts to secure the brackets to the shelf are rusted. The brackets arrived bent and needed to be straightened. The expansion bolts shipped with the unit were cheap, plastic, and ultimately useless when the provided screws couldn't even bite into them. 2 stars instead of 1 because after cleaning and sealing the rust, spending a few minutes on an anvil straightening brackets, and using decent metal anchor bolts, it looks okay and serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Overall, not a bad product. The supporting sides were bent at an off angle, so you do need to adjust it when screwing into the wall. The color is good and consistent throughout. It holds quite a few pans, and is an easy piece to move later should you want to. I would also recommend purchasing the lids holder with this as it looks great on the wall together. It was a bit smaller than I thought, however it is exactly the same length as most basic stoves.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick28

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable because it works, but not top quality workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and the brackets for attaching the shelf to the wall attached crookedly, so I sent it back. Received the replacement and the brackets still attached a little crookedly, but not as noticeably. The mounting hardware supplied for attaching the shelf to the wall were crap. Used some heavier duty toggle bolts I got from Lowe’s instead. Have had the shelf up for several weeks with my Cuisinart set of three skillets, two saucepans and another saucepan and lids on the hooks and a spaghetti cooker pot on the shelf. Holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wellman

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetic defect, but performs great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rack! I keep all of my pots and pans on it and it’s sturdy enough to handle it. I even store the glass lids on the shelf on top without even a small fear of it falling. The ONLY issue is one of the brackets was warped when it arrived. However, it’s only an aesthetic issue and doesn’t affect performance at all so it doesn’t bother me. Great solution for someone who doesn’t want their pots and pans hanging from the ceiling and doesn’t have the cabinet space to store them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Geez..... what a pain.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 2 stars, but once I rigged it, it looked good......but, you still have to rig it. It was also missing instructions...thanks for that.. whatever though, you dont really need them. The anchors are rubbish and do not fit nor support the screws at all. I had to toss the screws. The screws that did fit were too big for the holes, so I took a drill to enhance the opening. I then used washers to insure safety. It was a pain to hang since it was put together poorly. It took 3 people to stretch it into place. This could be a fantastic product, if only given better attention to detail when manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Forrester

customer_reviews.title: EXPECT TO BUY YOUR OWN ANCHORS
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shelf. LAUGHABLE quality mounting hardware. Luckily, we already had legit anchors to hold mount this to the wall but if we didn’t we’d either have to make a trip to a home improvement store or deal with our kitchenware crashing down. I assure you they didn’t use the hardware included in the box for the product images. The included anchors didn’t even hold the weight of the shelf- let alone $$ in pot and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Noble

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: We have just recently moved and we now have a tiny kitchen with little storage space. This is a great shelf. Nicely built and very easy to hang and assemble. Loved that it came with everything required to hang it including the wall anchors. So there was no guessing on what we needed. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Purchased for my friend as a housewarming ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Purchased for my friend as a housewarming product. Really easy to install with the instructions provided. Hanged 6 pans on it and seems really stable and durable. Will recommended this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Misaka

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Useful
customer_reviews.text: We bought this not knowing exactly what to expect. We just knew that we wanted to be able to hang our pans instead of keeping them in the cabinet. It works fantastic for that. It seems to be fairly good quality but it does have a couple areas that look like they will rust eventually. It was somewhat easy to assembly and hang, though it took a couple tries since it did not sit flush with wall perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Boilerbrave

customer_reviews.title: The set that comes in the package didn’t have a sturdy grip. Luckily we had some of those on ...
customer_reviews.text: It took a minute to get the trick of hanging against the wall. I ended up swapping the wall anchors for heavy duty ones. The set that comes in the package didn’t have a sturdy grip. Luckily we had some of those on my tool bag. No biggie but just a heads up. End product is just like the photos and the amount of hooks were more than enough and the fact that you can move them around makes the arrangement more convenient for the placing of the pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the wall anchors.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works well. The hooks are removable and, therefore, customizable and the rack can hold a lot of weight assuming you properly anchor it in the walls. I took off 1 star because the wall anchors they provided were useless and didn't catch properly or even take to the screws properly, so I had to use some anchors from the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Devin L. Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent space saver
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! My husband and I recently moved to a downtown apartment where we gave up a lot of the kitchen space we are used to. We quickly realized we didn't have room to fit all of our pots and pans in cabinets and decided to hop on Amazon for some ideas. Once we ordered this, we received it within a day and a half. This is one of our favorite purchases on Amazon so far! I don't think we will ever put pots in cabinets again. This was definitely a life saver in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney De Tello

customer_reviews.title: Easily access everything you need to cook a meal
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my under construction kitchen with no cabinets! I now have a home for my pots and pans... we put it together with the braces up, use the top shelf for spices, bought some extra S hooks and are using each side for hanging cooking utensils. I love that I can easily access everything I need to cook a meal within arms reach of my stove. Makes my life a lot simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Brown

customer_reviews.title: Hanging In!
customer_reviews.text: Our new wall rack perfect for our needs! It replaces a ceiling mounted rack that was far too obtrusive and view-blocking, but held lots of pots and pans. I was skeptical about the ability of the much smaller Zesproka Kitchen Wall Rack to meet our size needs but it is working very well for us. One minor complaint - two mounting screws are needed to install the rack; they are not included and should be.
customer_reviews.author: lvschultz2

customer_reviews.title: Great pot rack
customer_reviews.text: Great pot rack. Saves a lot of space and stores all the pots I have brilliantly. The top space is good for larger pots and a kettle. I highly suggest you do not use the provided anchors as they are absolutely terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Defective and Not Too Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This arrived missing one of the holes for a screw, so I had to do some makeshift work to get it to hang straight. I tried hanging pots and pans from it but they were too heavy and started to bend the metal rod down, so I only use it to hang spatulas and spoons now.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Strong and well built
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pan and pot rack. Well packaged. Strong and well built. Only thing I would like different is wall mount screws to be black. The and hooks are gloss black but silver screws just stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Wooster

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy! Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Everyone comments on how nice they look Although it comes with decent hardware we chose to buy heavier duty hardware so that we could be extra confident Nice size for a small area and very practica
customer_reviews.author: 45 year old female

customer_reviews.title: Item wouldn't fit together - be warned
customer_reviews.text: Though I saw other people's reviews about how the pieces did fit together, I foolishly thought that wouldn't happen to me and that I would get lucky with this. I didn't. It arrived, I eagerly opened the package, and as I tried to assemble it, I realized that the holes in the mounting brackets did not match the soldered on bolts on the shelf. There was just no way to get this thing together. Anyway, I sent it back and got a nearly identical version of this made by someone else and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Z,J,D&andD, Family Co.

customer_reviews.title: Functional & attractive shelf
customer_reviews.text: Well made shelf and pretty. Easy to hang. Have several small stainless steel saucepans hanging on it along with stainless measuring cups and spoons. It freed up a little space in my pan drawer and looks great in my stainless and black kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Florida transplant

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Do NOT use the enclosed anchors!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted in a rack. Easy to assemble and sturdy. My only complaint is the enclosed Anchors. They held for 2 weeks and tonight came out of the wall seined all the pans and a few pots to the floor crashing. I am going to rehang the rack with 4 75bls anchors to make sure it will hold to the wall. I had 4 frying pans and 3 pots hanging from it. Granted 2 of the pans were casket iron but I was careful not to exceed the 30-40bls suggested weights and did not see any bends in the actual rack. Just save yourself the extra step and purchase stonier anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Sean J Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: it works great, have many pots in it
customer_reviews.text: Metal construction is flexable which makes you think that is not capable of holding weight, but after it is install, it works great, have many pots in it, and I love the hooks that they include, highly recommend it. Wish they also made in stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rojas

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pan & pots hanger
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan & pots hanger. It's my 1st with a shelf. I can put my 2nd largest pot on top. I like that you can put the rack braces at top or bottom. Making custome fit your needs. I recommend this rack to everyone. I even hang my lid covers on this. Note: my pan covers have wide u handles for the hook to hold on to.they look good with 2 racks side by side too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer lovely lady

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I was at first disappointed I had to buy such a large number to add to my rack, but sure enough they've mostly all been used. Better to have a couple left over than not be able to hang some things.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice when assembled. Other reviewers concerns about measurements, specifically how it doesn't measure up to each stud, was an issue for me as well. I also got an extra bag of screws and drywall mounts (good for me, bad for all those claiming to have been missing theirs). Ultimately, got what I paid for and it serves its purpose just fine.
customer_reviews.author: MMP

customer_reviews.title: The rack itself is nice, but the anchors and screws are completely wrong--they ...
customer_reviews.text: The rack itself is nice, but the anchors and screws are completely wrong--they don't fit each other, and you will not be able to hang the product with them. Make sure if you purchase this product that you also purchase a package of #10 anchors and matching #10 screws, like one of the other reviews said. Also, note that there's not a of room to actually manage one of the screws, so you'll need either a very short/small drill or a very short screw driver (which is what I used since my drill is a normal size). If you have the right equipment, you really can get this up in 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Moved and new house didn't have a place for a large pot rack like we were used to. This was a great compromise and freed up a lot of cabinet space. Hang it upside down and there's more space more hooks. Forgive the paint in the pics, in the middle of a project.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya T

customer_reviews.title: OK product.
customer_reviews.text: The rack seems cheap but so far it's been sturdy enough to hold up our pots and pans. I don't know if I'd recommend this product to others as the materials (metal) seem not as sturdy for holding up such heavy items. I'm afraid to load it up too much.
customer_reviews.author: ayellowmelon

customer_reviews.title: Decent product but design flaw makes it difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: The unit overall looks good and seems sturdy, but it was difficult to install on the wall, as the top holes for screws for installation are so close to the side of the unit that we couldn't get the screws tight to the wall (stripped the screw while trying to get it flush with the wall - just couldn't access it with a normal screwdriver). Overall, however, the unit seems to be a good one and will save us some space in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: SGG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to use!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Zesproka kitchen pot rack hooks, 20 hooks black. I really like these hooks they are good quality, strong and easy to hang up. I have plenty hooks just in case I need more down the road!
customer_reviews.author: Tyann Iveys

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to have a pot and pan rack!!! This one is sturdy and has been a huge help in my crowded kitchen that doesn't have much room for storing things!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase for bookshelf or Wall Pot Rack
customer_reviews.text: Too large to attach to preferred location (my fault, should have measured not eyeballed). I will use in the office above desk for book rack. The piece seems to be well made and strong enough to hold books.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Set this up and was a little concerned that it could support the weight but I have been pleasantly surprised. It it currently holding 4 pans and several utensils and on the top shelf it is holding a large pan. Overall I am very Happy with this product and recommend to people to get it. It was easy to assemble and install. It looks great on the wall!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joel J Borek

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little shelf. It was sturdy, easy to hang and held all our pots and pans. My old apartment didn’t have enough storage and I hated keeping them in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: No harware no hooks
customer_reviews.text: the only thing i like about this is the packaging. no hardware at all I guess they took the advice of an earlier reviewer who said it would have been better if there was none. lol cause that's exactly what i got.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase for the money
customer_reviews.text: The rack looks really good once hung up. But the bolt holes for the L brackets were not the same on both side. Had to re-drill some holes to get both sides to line up. It's made in China, what do you expect. But decent product, just dont expect perfection out the box
customer_reviews.author: Armando m.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitchen short in storage.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to go in my daughter's kitchen in their new home. She didnt have many places to store pots and pans. It holds all of her pots, pans and cooking utensils easily. It was a snap to out together and install.
customer_reviews.author: That Artsy Chic

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this pan rack...!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best things I have ever received for xmas. I absolutely love it! It is so handy to have the pots & pans right there to access. Hanging them up is such a great idea, it keeps them out of the cupboards too. So practicle & yet simply organized. Would definately recommend this product to everyone, a must have for anyone who loves their kitchen organized. It goes great with my new Rachael Ray pan set also. LOVE IT! LOVE IT! Space the pans out with the included hooks, or every time you get a pan the rest of the pans play a musical noise. Although it is a great burglar alarm too, lol
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Great quality. One mount was cut.off centered so assembling the achors to the base was difficult. But, it works and you can't see if once it's hung. Just what we needed. Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Casey Coverdale

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for. I live in a small studio apartment and my kitchen doesn’t have the most storage space. This looks cute and matches my decor and saves me a lot of space! Easy to install as well!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for quite some time and it has held up. I have used all 10 hooks and even the top rack. It hasn't fell down or anything. Definitely adds more space to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Genette

customer_reviews.title: Hangs easy on the wall
customer_reviews.text: Hangs easy on the wall, easy assembly. Holds ALL my pots/pans, with shelf space above for cereals and stuff. Pretty good buy if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS. I use it next to my stove top for my spatulas and measuring items. Sturdy and holds 10 utensils, plus some of mine have a built in hook so it holds about 12 items. The rack at the top is great for spices and things you use regularly. And of course a house plant!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2!!!

customer_reviews.title: Stupid dimensions
customer_reviews.text: there is 24" between the supports. where do they build houses with studs that are 20" apart? you couldn't extend it to 32" so I could hit studs on both sides?
customer_reviews.author: wantdd214

customer_reviews.title: Great holder!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hanging on my wall for 3+ years at this point and it has not budged at all. It holds ours 6 pots and all of our pans with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S. Pross

customer_reviews.title: Didn't line up great.
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice (perhaps a little pricey for the materials), but when I tightened the brackets they were a bit misaligned with the rest of the unit. Also, one of the bolt covers broke, this wasn't a big deal, but since I'm reviewing I figured I'd meantion it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M

customer_reviews.title: Hard to mount, but works as it should
customer_reviews.text: VERY DIFFICULT TO MOUNT. The top screws are directly behind the support bar so it is very hard to get a screw driver in between to screw directly on. I would recommend mounting at least one side to a stud just in case you want to hold anything heavy. Otherwise, its a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and a headache to install.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worthless to us. The inner anchor hole is near impossible to drive a screw through. The drill can’t fit in the and the awkward angle makes it painful to hand screw because it only allows minimal movement each turn. The shelf is also quite small and would only hold one 10-12 inch pot/pan and maybe a small sauce pan. Will be returning and finding a better design.
customer_reviews.author: Anm208

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I've had this for almost a year and it's just as good as when I bought it. It saves me a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S

customer_reviews.title: Pot and pan rack
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I put my big pans on it the 23in is not bulky in the space I placed it and it looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Marlena G.

customer_reviews.title: Descent Shelf, can't use this hardware
customer_reviews.text: The metal assembly itself is exactly what you would expect. That being said when it arrives as it you CAN'T install it without a trip to home dept (to get real wall anchors). The mounting hardware is literally trash. Even if you do manage to get the anchor into your pre-drilled hole you risk ALL your pot and pans raining down on your dear Aunt Sally when the cheesy plastic tabs let go. Saving money on the wall anchors for something that's going to have lots of metal objects hanging off is quite an oversight on the company's behalf. Swipe left on this buy, or add some real anchors to your cart.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect size for her small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother. Great quality and perfect size for her small kitchen. Since it goes onto the wall it take less space and you can put it how high or low you need.
customer_reviews.author: Ashro

customer_reviews.title: It installed easily although we had to purchase mounting screws - there ...
customer_reviews.text: I was able to fit all my cookware on the rack. It installed easily although we had to purchase mounting screws - there were none in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Shari T.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I've ever ordered from Amazon. I order a replacement and it somehow came in worse condition than the orginal. The pieces are warped, the holes are drilled out of line, and nothing fits together. You'd be better off spending a little more on a higher quality product, which is exactly what I plan on doing after I return this for the second time. Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Farugia

customer_reviews.title: but do like everyone else did and buy better wall anchors
customer_reviews.text: Works incredibly well.. but do like everyone else did and buy better wall anchors. The ones this comes with is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ol' John boy

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST! Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST! Easy to install, and makes the kitchen look and function SO MUCH BETTER. We bought it because we just moved into a new rental with a huge kitchen & not a lot of cabinet space. This helped make up for it big time, with the added bonus of looking great!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Frances

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This looks so sharp in my non-traditional apartment kitchen. I love the way it displays my pots and pans and am thoroughly impressed by the sturdiness
customer_reviews.author: JulieM

customer_reviews.title: This product arrived on time. However it did not ...
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time. However it did not have the correct hardware (screws) to attach it to the wall. We will have to go to the hardware store to get the correct screws.
customer_reviews.author: Iceland

customer_reviews.title: I want a replacement or my money back!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this, and then I put the pieces together and saw the parts themselves wouldn’t lay flat against the wall so impossible to screw all four holes to the wall not only that the parts wouldn’t line up so the bars went in. I’m sad because I wasted 40 bucks on this
customer_reviews.author: samantha jo Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Did an excellent job and looks great on the wall
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately bought this a month before we moved into a new home and could not take it with us. Did an excellent job and looks great on the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Good product, could be slightly better
customer_reviews.text: Love the rack and how sturdy it is. Would be nice of it was set at a width to naturally hit studs rather than be forced to use anchors. But with metal anchors it is extremely strong and sturdy and looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good, But Use Stronger Anchors
customer_reviews.text: The rack is easy to put together, feels substantial, and looks clean. However I would suggest to use different anchors than the ones provided. I used snap-toggle bolts (1/4" size, the ones you need to use a 1/2" drill bit for) on the top holes, and the provided anchors on the bottom holes. It seems to be very sturdy with those fasteners. Overall, I would recommend this rack.
customer_reviews.author: JAY

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf and storage
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest handiest little shelf that comes in various sizes. I got one which perfectly fits my small kitchen. It accents the decor like it was designed for it. Very happy with this purchase. My friend was able to install in minutes with a drill. It seems very sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: tandmme

customer_reviews.title: it's a great product
customer_reviews.text: it's not fancy, but it's practical and holds all of my pans instead of me fighting with shoving them in a cupboard! Pans are not meant to stack anyway, they will warp, dent if you continue to stack them, so i am very happy with this product! now if someone would just come to my house and clean them for me after every use!!! - (JK)!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gray

customer_reviews.title: NO HARDWARE INCLUDED WITH ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I am supposed to hang this rack, there is no hardware included with purchase. If I wanted to go to the hardware store to by anchors, screws, nuts and bolts, I would have purchased the rack there. Another Amazon item that I have to return. Lately Amazon has been a waste of my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Simentales

customer_reviews.title: Better than described.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure it would hold up by picture on Amazon, but it turned out really sturdy and holds an assortment of items in the tray basket on top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Samll Kitchens!
customer_reviews.text: This has been so helpful for our very small kitchen space. It freed up 2 cabinets for me by getting our pots and pans out plus some counter space by having the shelf on top. It looks adorable also!
customer_reviews.author: Niki G.

customer_reviews.title: The design itself is fine. There is plenty of room for pans and ...
customer_reviews.text: The design itself is fine. There is plenty of room for pans and smaller pots to sit on top. However, the drywall anchors provided are garbage. I had placed a smaller pot on the top and three of my pans when it pulled out of the wall and almost hit the floor. I will have to make a separate trip to the hardware store to find better mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rumsey

customer_reviews.title: The metal was warped or not made correctly so luckily ...
customer_reviews.text: The metal was warped or not made correctly so luckily I work at a shop where I could fix it otherwise I wouldn’t be able to attach it to a wall
customer_reviews.author: J&C Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have new copper cook set...didn't want to stack them under the sink...I love it
customer_reviews.author: charles peterson

customer_reviews.title: handy
customer_reviews.text: This rack really opened up more space in a crowded kitchen. I hang my good skillets from the hooks. The construction is good and the rack is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Mumper

customer_reviews.title: So in love with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a decent pot rack that's not over size. Simply because i live in a small nyc apartment,with no kitchen space. And this did it for me, decent quality for the price. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Peta

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Too many parts arent lined up making it crooked, poor quality product. Even some of the wall inserts were crooked. Don't feel confident hanging anything with weight on this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good budget rack, but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy rack and works well. However, there are problems. The sides of the rack aren't straight, and the mounting hardware is terrible. I got new mounting screws and was able to install the rack satisfactorily.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: It is also very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a new place and I had a lot of appliances lying around. So I bought this and I was worried where to put so many things; this was supposed to come in 4-5 days however it arrived in two days. It is also very easy to install, which was a relief.
customer_reviews.author: JiaMei

customer_reviews.title: These are metal hooks. They hook onto racks (assuming ...
customer_reviews.text: These are metal hooks. They hook onto racks (assuming they rack is of appropriate size) & hang. They allow you to store things in mid air. This is not rocket surgery people. There's not a lot to say about the product other than they operate as expected. yay
customer_reviews.author: Julia Carter

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrid quality control. FOUR of the "welds" were broken. Metal is flimsy and bends easily.. had to use JB Weld to fix it. Save your money or buy a better quality item. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Shoulda bought it sooner lol
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Helped me clean up the clutter under the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Tim pelles

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I can only give 1 star,because it only came with 1 of the 2 mounts needed to hang it.Unfortunately by the time I decided to open the box,my return window had closed.I try to find a matching piece at Home Depot,no luck.So I am now,stuck with it or have to order a whole new rack.
customer_reviews.author: Ambitious leah

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs. It is right over the stove,and everything is in perfect reach. We added extra support to hang small pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Hughes

customer_reviews.title: The keeper of kitchen essentials
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific pot rack for the price it’s sleek and absolutely adorable in a smaller kitchen I had a stainless large one in my older house; but absolutely love the structure of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia

customer_reviews.title: This product is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kitchen...I love it! Holds my nice pots and pans. Gave me more space in my cabnates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wall anchors are junk.
customer_reviews.text: Wall anchors are junk. Cheaply made but passes. I would not recommend this if your planning on holding anything heavy on it. And DEFINITELY do NOT use the wall anchors it comes with. Junk. Use wall anchors that work properly. Created a bigger headache than this product is worth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love it!! It wasn’t hard to install and good size for our kitchen :) good quality too!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Zúrich

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Design
customer_reviews.text: Put up the end did September and it just fell down at 3am this morning. Looking at the brackets now they don’t even match up. One is longer than the other and also bent slightly. The bracket came like that but I figured it should be fine once my handyman put it up. Won’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Product came bent and some of the drywall anchors did not work. Why not just make to accept 16" stud mounts? Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Ethan O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super quick and easy to install. It’s currently holding over a dozen pots and pans. I love it. No more cramped cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Everything fit together perfectly. This pot rack even included the wall anchors need to hang it in the kitchen. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect...then she made buy new pots and pans to go with this rack...LOL
customer_reviews.author: steven p.

customer_reviews.title: Study and durable
customer_reviews.text: I don't really have any dislikes. I read some of the negative feedback and it made me a little nervous buying this however I am very happy with my purchase. It can hold 3 larger cast iron pots, life and cutting boards along with pans. I recommend this to anyone trying to organize and make more space in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: kristin framo

customer_reviews.title: Hello Organization!
customer_reviews.text: This was Exactly what I needed to help me organize and maximize my kitchen space pretty sturdy and not bad for the price. measurements are accurate for end to end but where the holes line up i would say like 22 Inches. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jennelle

product_meta.title: ZESPROKA Kitchen Wall Pot Pan Rack,With 10 Hooks,Black
feature_bullets: Simple style metallic kitchen pot rack, specially designed for storing pots and utensils, which help to save even more space in your kitchen.
Dimensions of pot rack: 24.5 inches x10inches x 9.9 inches. with 10 S-type hooks.
The pot rack is made of thick materials, hand-made welding.. It can withstand a weight of 30-40 lb. It has been specially treated to prevent rusting.
There are two installation methods for the pot rack, either method allows you to organize the containers and utensils in the way you want.
This pot rack can be installed on your balcony, study or bathroom and can be used to hang many other types of household items

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars794 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
